idea-plugin.name: Switch2VSCode
idea-plugin.description:
Switch2VSCode is a JetBrains IDE plugin that enables seamless switching between IDE and Visual Studio Code while maintaining precise cursor position.

Key Features

  • Open files in VSCode with one click
  • Maintain exact cursor position (line and column)
  • Support opening entire projects in VSCode
  • Convenient shortcuts (customizable):
    • Alt+Shift+O - Open current file
    • Alt+Shift+P - Open current project
  • Multiple access methods: shortcuts, context menu, tools menu

Usage

  • Open current file:
    • Press Alt+Shift+O
    • Right-click in editor â†’ Open File In VSCode
    • Tools menu â†’ Open File In VSCode
  • Open project:
    • Press Alt+Shift+P
    • Right-click in project view â†’ Open Project In VSCode
    • Tools menu â†’ Open Project In VSCode

Configuration

  • Go to Settings/Preferences â†’ Tools â†’ Switch2VSCode
  • Set VSCode executable path (default is "code")
  • Customize shortcuts in Keymap settings

Requirements

  • Visual Studio Code installed (https://code.visualstudio.com)
  • Compatible with all JetBrains IDEs
  • Supported IDE versions: 2022.3 and above
